name: Stoicmaxims.GitHub.io
body:
## Help Build A Stoic Maxims Directory.
We're all on the lookout for quotes to meditate on. Let's gather the largest directory of them to together.
Lets keep them as maxims, ie. short memorable snippets, distilled and byte sized.
If you wish to add to it, submit a pull request, or send submissions in the below format to **stoicmaxims@outlook.com** and I'll do my best to get them added.

**format 1 per line**:
Quote[tab]Whom

* [Pretty List](https://github.com/stoicmaxims/stoicmaxims.github.io/blob/master/list.tsv)
* [Raw List](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/stoicmaxims/stoicmaxims.github.io/master/list.tsv)
* [Download](https://stoicmaxims.github.io/list.tsv)

### Using With Code
More formats coming soon.

#### Python

```
import csv

with open("list.tsv") as tsv:
    for line in csv.reader(tsv, delimiter="\t"): 
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
